segments.text: Ange , can your dog do any tricks yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yeah ! He can sit down , roll over , and even play dead .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yup.Hey , do you want to see a picture ? See , he's eating lunch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This can't be the same dog . He's so clean , he shines .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's really cute . His bowl even has his name on it .
segments.speaker: S1
